duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide friendly and efficient customer service in the golf shop, including cash handling and checking in golfers.
Respond to inquiries, make tee times, and focus on Members' and guests' needs, remaining professional and courteous at all times.
Manage inventory controls, merchandise check-in, and organization of storage and display areas.
Assist in marshaling, starting, and providing shop support to the Head Golf Professional and Tournament Coordinators.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma, GED, or equivalent
